deployHistory.changes: Major SEO upgrade: 5 dedicated service landing pages (wedding, balayage, color-correction, extensions, keratin), visitor metrics dashboard, SEO score tracker, engagement tracker, updated navigation with services dropdown
Fixed competitors page spinner stuck - destroy chart before recreating, better error handling
Fixed dashboard Error - added null checks for DOM elements, score now loads correctly
Fixed version badge showing on all admin pages, updated Claude model to claude-3-5-haiku
Removed redundant GitHub Actions workflow - Vercel auto-deploys natively, no more failure emails
Version badge added to ALL admin page headers - always shows current version
Analyze with AI button now shows LIVE/Cached status + timestamp when data was refreshed
Google Places + Claude AI integration - LIVE competitor data and AI recommendations
PageSpeed API now uses FREE tier - no API key required, live SEO analysis works
All admin pages now dynamic: index, competitors, rankings load from API
Admin index.html now fetches all data from API - no hardcoded data
Fixed admin ai-config.js to use production API, added tasks/analytics endpoints
Removed hardcoded version fallback, consolidated to single version.json, API endpoints working
Fixed invalid JSON (trailing comma) that prevented version display in footer
Moved API functions to root /api folder for Vercel serverless support
